questions.question: What is our current headcount?
variations: How many employees do we have?

questions.question: How has headcount changed over the last {time_period}?
What is the headcount breakdown by {dimension}?
Which departments are growing fastest?
How many new hires did we have in {time_period}?
What is our attrition rate for {time_period}?
Show me attrition by {dimension}
What is the split between voluntary and involuntary turnover?
What are the top reasons employees are leaving (from exit interviews)?
How many promotions happened in {time_period}?
What is our promotion rate?
variations: What percentage of employees get promoted annually?

questions.question: Show promotions by {dimension}
What is the average time to promotion from {level}?
How many internal transfers occurred in {time_period}?
What is our internal mobility rate?
variations: What percentage of employees change roles internally?

questions.question: Which departments have the most incoming/outgoing transfers?
What is the average tenure before an internal move?
variations: How long do employees stay in a role before transferring?

questions.question: Summarize performance review themes from {time_period}
What is the distribution of performance ratings?
variations: How many employees rated exceptional vs needs improvement?

questions.question: What are the top development areas mentioned in performance reviews?
What are employees' career aspirations (from performance reviews)?
variations: What do employees want in their careers?

questions.question: How many training hours per employee did we deliver in {time_period}?
What is our training investment per FTE?
variations: How much do we spend on training per employee?

questions.question: Which training categories are most popular?
What is the training completion rate?
variations: How many employees complete their trainings?

questions.question: Which job families receive the most training hours?
What is the average absence rate (days per employee per year)?
variations: How many days off do employees take on average?

questions.question: Show absence breakdown by type
variations: How many vacation vs sick leave days?

questions.question: Which departments have the highest absence rates?
Are there seasonal patterns in absences?
variations: When do employees take the most time off?

questions.question: How many open HR cases do we have?
What are the most common types of HR cases?
What is the average case resolution time?
variations: How long does it take to resolve HR cases?
Case resolution time by case type

questions.question: Which HR cases are overdue or taking the longest?
What are the common themes in HR case notes (AI summary)?
Show me the top 5 HR KPIs
What are our biggest HR risks right now?
Compare our HR metrics to industry benchmarks
variations: How do we stack up against competitors?

questions.question: Show attrition trend over the last {time_period}
Is our promotion rate improving over time?
How has training investment changed year-over-year?
What is the retention rate for employees hired in {year}?
Compare attrition rates between new hires (<1 year tenure) vs tenured employees
Which hire cohort has the highest promotion rate?
What is the average salary by {dimension}?
questions.note: Only show if group size >= 10 employees

questions.question: How does compensation change with tenure?
variations: Salary growth curve by years of service

questions.question: What is the compa-ratio distribution?
questions.note: Compa-ratio = actual salary / midpoint of salary band

questions.question: Based on historical trends, how many employees will we have in {time_period}?
questions.note: Use linear regression on headcount trend

questions.question: If current attrition trend continues, how many employees will leave next quarter?
